titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. "mandat" unclear, but has to do with sending

body.ab:
19317 DACHARY Mademoiselle. R. 59. rue des Chalets Toulouse. (Hte Garonne)
sent mandat. (17.50 1m. 1v. prov: 16.50 Deposit 30 Feb 3. Song of the Lark. post. 2.40 Feb. 17- 16 Lucy Gayheart post 2.00 Feb 23 23 Obscure Obituaries post. 2.00 March 1 March 1. Study of the Modern Novel post 2.20 March 8 6. American Fictions post 3.60 March 11 Renewed Mar. 3 - April 3rd. paid Mar. 8 mandat 6.50 March 11 Not under Fourty p. 1.80 Mar. 17 March 17. sent letter about books on Cather______ 17. Youth and the Bright Medusa p. 1.80 March 25 17. credited one week for book not send. sub still April 10th wrote letter apologizing. April 2. New American Literature. April 27 Shadows on the Rocks post 3.80 April 27 April 2. sent bill for postage 19.60 April 5 Willa Cather (pamphlet) p. 1.00 SB wrote April 5 May 6 SB wrote May 6 would send One of Ours and O Pioneers if could find copies in Paris
